Premium Referral Program

As a trainer on Improove, you may participate in our “Premium Referral Program” by referring potential users to the Service. Under the Premium Referral Program, you will receive an award for each new user that visits Improove through your unique referral link and pays for their first month (or year) of Premium Membership. The value of your award is the 40% of the fee payed by the user on his first subscription. Award payments are subject to forfeiture or clawback if the user disputes the credit card charge or otherwise violates the payment terms, or if the trainer is found to be in violation of our terms. You will receive this reward within 50 days of the user paying for Premium Membership.
In order to receive a Premium Referral Award, each of the following requirements must be met: (i) you must own your Improove “Referral Code”; (ii) you must share the Referral Code with friends, family, and followers; (iii) a user who uses your Referral Code must create a Improove account and make his first Membership payment.

If you have canceled your Improove Membership, you will lose access to all Trainings at the end of your billing period. If you choose to sign back up as a paying member, your billing date will reset to the day you paid.

When you provide a Payment Method, we will attempt to verify the information you entered by processing an authorization hold. We do not charge you in connection with this authorization hold, but your available balance or credit limit may be reduced. By providing your payment details in conjunction with the trial, you agree to this charge using such payment details.
